comments: She\'s so freaking smart and hot! I was a pretty lazy student, so at first I wasn\'t excited about studying as much.She has so much life and is so original in her teaching, that it inspired me to do better. Today,I value being on the Dean\'s list/ President\'s list. I got it! I\'ll always strive 4 better! Tks Dr Francis! You\'re a great inspiration!

Very stylish and beautiful French woman. Never learned so much from a professor before. I also studied abroad with her in Paris: best experience ever!If you\'re lazy, you won\'t like it ;) Dr. Francis expects the best of her students. She is so smart!I loved her classes. She has a very unique teaching style that engaged me the whole time. LOVE HER!
She is very nice but soo hard. I wish she would relax a little and make things a little but easier for the students.

A pretty awesome person...and I did quite well in her class through a lot of hard work...but I think that she expects A LOT from her students...maybe more than is necessary. It was pretty fustrating sometimes especially when taking other classes. I know American students arent at the top of the worlds academic chain but try to give us a break anyw
Dr. Francis is fantastic! she is so much fun to listen to and learn from. She is extremely helpful and wil do everything possible to engage you. And by far the most stylish!
She is absolutely amazing and her class is the highlight of my day. Everyone should take her class...absolutely amazing..wow..idk what else to say
